document.full_text: the bank of japan is expected to keep monetary policy steady on thursday but will sharply cut its economic forecast for the current fiscal year and signal its readiness to ease further if damage from last month's earthquake proves bigger than expected.
document.title: boj seen holding fire
lines_and_colors: the bank of japan is expected to keep monetary policy steady on thursday but will sharply cut its economic forecast for the current fiscal year and signal its readiness to ease further if damage from last month's earthquake proves bigger than expected.
